articles.description: Google Meet has seen sharp growth, but still falls far behind Zoom, which has crossed 100 million Play Store downloads at the time of publishing.
articles.content: Sending a warning call to Zoom, Google Meet has crossed 50 million downloads on Play Store, a massive 900 per cent increase in user base in a span of few weeks as people work from home in the Covid-19 pandemic. According to data provided by AppBrain, Google's… [+1297 chars]

articles.description: Last week, Epic Games Store made GTA 5 availbale for free on PC. GTA Online has suffered as a result with hackers and moddders ruling the roost.
